hibernate-mapping.query: select new lsbusinesstypedto ( b.Code, b.Description, b.UserNo, b.Date_Time ) from LOMORM00076 as b where (b.Code =: code or b.Description =: description) and b.Active = true

select new lsbusinesstypedto ( b.Code, b.Description, b.UserNo, b.Date_Time, b.Active, b.TS, b.CreatedDate, b.CreatedUserId, b.UpdatedDate, b.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00076 as b where (b.Code =: code or b.Description =: description)

select new lsbusinesstypedto ( b.Code, b.Description, b.UserNo, b.Date_Time, b.Active, b.TS, b.CreatedDate, b.CreatedUserId, b.UpdatedDate, b.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00076 as b where b.Active = true

select new lsbusinesstypedto( b.Code, b.Description, b.UserNo, b.Date_Time, b.Active, b.TS, b.CreatedDate, b.CreatedUserId, b.UpdatedDate, b.UpdatedUserId ) from LOMORM00076 as b where b.Code = :code and b.Active = true
